Hi! My name's BDSC Assistant, a chatbot designed to help and communicate with students, parents, teachers and more to help guide their way to find information on the Botany Downs Secondary College (BDSC) Website. How may I help you?

5. Are there any scholarship or financial aid opportunities for students at BDSC?
